attributes.action: Ban all smokers from owning pets of any kind
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anybody who smokes should be banned for their smoking life from owning animals of any kind, as it is completely unfair on the animal to be subjected to second hand smoke when it has no choice or ability to be able to get away from the harmful effects.
Many animals would suffer less from cancer, and other associated illness if smokers were not allowed to be able to torture animals in this way.
